column5: You may keep walleye and sauger measuring 32 cm or more. Walleye and sauger may be whole Note 2 or in fillets of 20 cm or more. The skin must adhere to the fillets over their entire length. http://www.mrnf.gouv.qc.ca/english/p...ion-limits.asp
Thxs Andre. I hope this regulation applies to the gang at Obedjiwan.
